verses.text: In the \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* was \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* was \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1095"\w*; and the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add was\add* \w true|strong="H0571"\w*, but the time \w appointed|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* \w long|strong="H1419"\w*: and he \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, and had \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* of the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w*.\f + \fr 10.1 \ft long: Heb. great\f*

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* I \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* was \w mourning|strong="H0056"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*.\f + \fr 10.2 \ft full…: Heb. weeks of days\f*

I \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* no \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, neither \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* nor \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* in my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, neither did I \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* myself at \w all|strong="H5480"\w*, till \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w whole|strong="H3117"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* were \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*.\f + \fr 10.3 \ft pleasant…: Heb. bread of desires\f*

And in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, as I was by the \w side|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Hiddekel|strong="H2313"\w*;

Then I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and behold a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* in \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, whose \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \add were\add* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* with fine \w gold|strong="H3800"\w* of \w Uphaz|strong="H0210"\w*:\f + \fr 10.5 \ft a…: Heb. one man\f*

His \w body|strong="H1472"\w* also \add was\add* like the \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*, and his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*, and his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* as \w lamps|strong="H3940"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and his \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* and his \w feet|strong="H4772"\w* like in \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* to \w polished|strong="H7044"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w words|strong="H1697"\w* like the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*.

And I \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* alone \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*: for the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that were with me \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* not the \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*; \w but|strong="H0061"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w quaking|strong="H2731"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon them, so that they \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* to \w hide|strong="H2244"\w* themselves.

Therefore I was left \w alone|strong="H7604"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*, and there \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* no \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* in me: for my \w comeliness|strong="H1935"\w* was \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* in me into \w corruption|strong="H4889"\w*, and I \w retained|strong="H6113"\w* no \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*.\f + \fr 10.8 \ft comeliness: or, vigour\f*

Yet \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* I the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: and when I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, then was I in a deep \w sleep|strong="H7290"\w* on my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ And, behold, an \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* me, which \w set|strong="H5128"\w* me upon my \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* and \add upon\add* the \w palms|strong="H3709"\w* of my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 10.10 \ft set: Heb. moved\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, O \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* greatly \w beloved|strong="H2532"\w*, \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w upright|strong="H5977"\w*: for unto thee am I now \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*. And when he had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* unto me, I \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7460"\w*.\f + \fr 10.11 \ft greatly…: Heb. of desires\f*\f + \fr 10.11 \ft upright: Heb. upon thy standing\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*: for from the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thou didst \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*, and to \w chasten|strong="H6031"\w* thyself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* were \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, and I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* for thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

But the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w withstood|strong="H5975"\w* me \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: but, lo, \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w chief|strong="H7223"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w help|strong="H5826"\w* me; and I \w remained|strong="H3498"\w* there \w with|strong="H0681"\w* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft chief: or, first\f*

Now I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to make thee \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* what shall \w befall|strong="H7136"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: for yet the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \add is\add* for \add many\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And when he had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* such \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto me, I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and I became \w dumb|strong="H0481"\w*.

And, behold, \add one\add* like the \w similitude|strong="H1823"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: then I \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* before me, O my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, by the \w vision|strong="H4759"\w* my \w sorrows|strong="H6735"\w* are \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* upon me, and I have \w retained|strong="H6113"\w* no \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*.

For \w how|strong="H1963"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of this my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* with this my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*? for as for me, \w straightway|strong="H6258"\w* there \w remained|strong="H5975"\w* no \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* in me, neither is there \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in me.\f + \fr 10.17 \ft the…: or, this servant of my lord\f*

Then there came \w again|strong="H3254"\w* and \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* me \add one\add* like the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and he \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* me,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w man|strong="H0376"\w* greatly \w beloved|strong="H2532"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* unto thee, be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, yea, be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*. And when he had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, I was \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*; for thou hast \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* me.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he, \w Knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou wherefore I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee? and now will I \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*: and when I am gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, lo, the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Grecia|strong="H3120"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0061"\w* I will \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee that which is \w noted|strong="H7559"\w* in the \w scripture|strong="H3791"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: and \add there is\add* \w none|strong="H0259"\w* that \w holdeth|strong="H2388"\w* with me in these things, but \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w* your \w prince|strong="H8269"\w*.\f + \fr 10.21 \ft holdeth: Heb. strengtheneth himself\f*
